nodes.bodyText: Can we also edit the text "Create new BSP project based on this Pants project"? It doesn't appear in this property file.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -58,7 +58,7 @@ pants.settings.text.use.intellij.compiler=Use the IntelliJ compiler [Experimenta
 pants.settings.text.use.intellij.compiler.help.messasge=If your project does not work with IntelliJ compiler out of the box, please try to conform the code structure to 1:1:1.
 pants.settings.text.use.intellij.compiler.help.messasge.link=https://www.pantsbuild.org/build_files.html#target-granularity
 
-pants.bsp.select.targets=Amend BSP Project
+pants.bsp.select.targets=Amend Fastpass Project

nodes.bodyText: nit: can we use a Executors.newSingleThreadScheduledExecutor() and .scheduleWithFixedDelay(...) instead? Feel free to ignore, not sure what's the idiomatic way to achieve this.
I don't need this delay at all, I just used it for debugging, nvm
Can you explain why we sleep 15 seconds? What happens if the amend process completes faster than 15 seconds?
Oh, sorry, I used it only for debugging! It should be removed

For consistency with other commands
